amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of Executive Order 13653 or Executive Order 13693 pertaining to climate change adaptation and sustainability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 234 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 234 (Roll no. 464).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A082) offered by Mr. Beyer.
